orderedList: Download the OptimalShip module for Drupal/Ubercart. This can be found here: Download ZIP file
Go to the Admin Panel of your Drupal/Ubercart store. Click Modules.
Click "Install new module" in the Modules window.
Click on "Choose File" and find the download module ZIP file. Click "Install."

The Update Manager should show that the installation was successful.
Then click "Enable newly added modules."
Scroll down to the section entitled "UBERCART-FULFILLMENT" and click the checkbox for "OptimalShip." If needed, enable any required modules listed for the OptimalShip module.
Scroll down to the section entitled "UBERCART-FULFILLMENT" and click the checkbox for "OptimalShip." If needed, enable any required modules listed for the OptimalShip module.
Scroll back down to the section entitled "UBERCART-FULFILLMENT" and click the Configure link for "OptimalShip"
In the Shipping Quotes window, click on the OPTIMAL button
Enter your OptimalShip Export Number. Click both checkboxes to enable the rates and to calculate dimensional weights based on package dimensions. Click Save Configuration.
DHL with OptimalShip should now appear in your store's shopping cart for International shipping destinations
